last_episode_to_air.name: K.C. Undercover: The Final Chapter
last_episode_to_air.overview: K.C. struggles to decide if she should continue as a full time spy or live a normal life at college.

name: K.C. Undercover
overview: K.C. Cooper, a high school math whiz and karate black-belt, learns that her parents are spies when they recruit her to join them in the secret government agency, The Organization. While she now has the latest spy gadgets at her disposal, K.C. has a lot to learn about being a spy, including keeping her new gig a secret from her best friend Marisa. Together, K.C. and her parents, Craig and Kira, and her younger siblings, Ernie and Judy (a humanoid robot), try to balance everyday family life while on undercover missions, near and far, to save the world.
tagline: Saving the world. No big thing.

episodes.name: Pilot
episodes.overview: K.C. Cooper, a high school math whiz and martial arts expert, learns her parents are spies when they recruit her to join them in the secret government agency. The newly appointed teen spy takes on her first undercover assignment, which coincides with her school dance. The mission: apprehend an enemy teen spy and recover the code for a virus designed to render every mobile device useless.

episodes.name: My Sister from Another Mother... Board
episodes.overview: K.C. tries to convince her parents that her brother, Ernie, who is a genius with computers but pretty clumsy at everything else, is ready to become a spy. However, Craig and Kira have a different plan and introduce them to their new little sister, Judy - a sophisticated humanoid robot disguised as a precocious 10-year-old.

episodes.name: Give Me a 'K'! Give Me a 'C'!
episodes.overview: K.C. reluctantly agrees to try out for cheerleading with Marisa so they can spend more time together. Meanwhile, Craig tries to bond with Ernie over sports, but quickly learns his son's gaming skills are better online than on the field.

episodes.name: Off the Grid
episodes.overview: K.C. and Ernie team up with their retired-spy grandparents - Grandma and Pops - to rescue Craig and Kira from a dangerous mission.

episodes.name: Photo Bombed
episodes.overview: Marisa has been named a finalist in a photo contest and her winning photo could be in magazines and billboards everywhere, the only problem is her entry photo is of K.C.

episodes.name: How K.C. Got Her Swag Back
episodes.overview: When K.C. loses her confidence after making a big mistake on a mission, Marisa goes on her own mission to get her bestie back on her game.

episodes.name: Daddy's Little Princess
episodes.overview: The Coopers are assigned to protect Prince Promomomo and must hide the teenage leader in their home for a few days. But when K.C. and the Prince become smitten with each other, Craig quickly puts his spy duties aside to remind the Prince that as K.C.'s father, he is the king.

episodes.name: Assignment: Get That Assignment
episodes.overview: When Agent Beverly from The Organization hassles K.C. for her last mission report, the same classified information that Marisa has inadvertently used as her class paper, the best friends must race against the clock to get the assignment back.

episodes.name: Spy-anoia Will Destroy Ya
episodes.overview: When K.C's somewhat awkward brother brings home a super gorgeous girlfriend, K.C is convinced that she's really a spy. She tries everything to get her to open up, including handcuffing her to an armchair and 'tickle-tasering' her. When nothing works, K.C pretends to talk to someone on her spy bracelet, saying that she'll get the 'important files' in her locker at school. Overhearing K.C's pretend conversation and thinking it was real, Jolie follows K.C to school where they end up having a fight. K.C manages to knock Jolie out with gas from her bracelet. Because Jolie was only Ernie's girlfriend for info about their family, K.C gets her to tell Ernie that she's going to be the first teen in space and must begin her training the next day. Jolie leaves forever and K.C then makes up with her brother and shows him her new earrings that she stole from Jolie.

episodes.name: Double Crossed Part 1
episodes.overview: When The Organization assigns Junior Spy of the Year, Brett Willis, to go undercover as K.C.'s boyfriend for a mission, K.C. winds up having real feelings for him. Meanwhile, Craig and Kira receive alarming news that their old arch rival Zane is back and determined to destroy them.

episodes.name: Double Crossed Part 2
episodes.overview: Zane has captured K.C., but her family has no idea because the evil agent has created a K.C. look alike to take her place and defeat the Cooper family.

episodes.name: Double Crossed Part 3
episodes.overview: The K.C. doppelgänger gains access to The Organization, now Kira and Craig must race against the clock to save their daughter and the agency.

episodes.name: Stakeout Takeout
episodes.overview: When K.C. decides to take a must needed vacation during a stakeout to catch a notorious robber, Ernie finally gets a chance to "bake the biscuits" and prove to his dad and K.C., that he is more than just the computer guy.

episodes.name: The Neighborhood Watchdogs
episodes.overview: When Mrs. Goldfeder's house is robbed, K.C. recruits her dad to organize and lead a neighborhood watch group, much to his chagrin. Meanwhile, Judy enlists Pentatonix to help her deliver a special message to Petey.

episodes.name: First Friend
episodes.overview: K.C. goes undercover as a college student at The University of Maryland to befriend and protect the President of The Organization's daughter, Eliza. Meanwhile, Judy tries to talk Ernie into letting her join his Adventure Scout troupe.

episodes.name: Operation: Other Side Part 1
episodes.overview: K.C. goes even deeper undercover into The Other Side’s training ground and is close to getting the intel she needs, when she discovers Brett is her new training officer.

episodes.name: Operation: Other Side Part 2
episodes.overview: K.C. goes even deeper undercover into The Other Side’s training ground and is close to getting the intel she needs, when she discovers Brett is her new training officer.

episodes.name: K.C. and the Vanishing Lady
episodes.overview: The Cooper family tries to take a much-needed vacation from spying, but their plans are interrupted when a wealthy socialite vanishes from their resort and K.C. is determined to find out what happened.

episodes.name: Debutante Baller
episodes.overview: Kira tricks K.C. into participating in the mother daughter Cotillion Ball by telling her it’s an undercover mission. But K.C. puts a damper on her mom’s plans when she enlists Marisa to help her go from her usual tomboy drab to Debutant glam.

episodes.name: K.C.'s the Man
episodes.overview: To rescue an agent's son at an all-boys cadet academy, K.C. goes undercover as a male cadet with Ernie.

episodes.name: Runaway Robot
episodes.overview: K.C. Cooper enlists the help of former spy and computer engineering expert Simone Deveraux when her family's sophisticated robot, Judy, runs away and is captured by enemy agents.

episodes.name: All Howl's Eve
episodes.overview: Ernie and Judy must travel to NYC for the Central Park Spooktacular to intercept an evil wolf serum, but their mission is interrupted when they run into “Jessie’s” Emma and Zuri at the party. Meanwhile, Marisa and K.C. throw their own Halloween bash back at the house and K.C. decides to dress up as a spy to impress the new boy in school, River.

episodes.name: The Get Along Vault
episodes.overview: K.C. and Ernie who, when trapped inside a bank vault, must figure out how to put their sibling rivalry aside and work together to escape.

episodes.name: Enemy of the State
episodes.overview: When a former foe needs the Coopers' help, the family has to decide if they can face the consequences of aiding the enemy.

episodes.name: Twas the Fight Before Christmas
episodes.overview: K.C. plans to give her dad the most perfect christmas gift of all, a surprise visit from his dad. When he arrives, she’s the one who ends up surprised. It turns out that Craig and Poppa Earl not only don’t get along very well, he also has no idea that they are all spies.

episodes.name: K.C. and Brett: The Final Chapter (1)
episodes.overview: Brett is back and his assignment is to eliminate K.C.! But when he can’t bring himself to complete his mission, K.C. decides to help protect him from The Other Side.

episodes.name: K.C. and Brett: The Final Chapter (2)
episodes.overview: When K.C. enlists her family to help Brett escape from The Other Side, the Coopers find themselves in danger with enemy agents and The Organization.

episodes.name: Coopers Reactivated!
episodes.overview: Six months no longer part of the Organization, the Coopers have to live their lives without being spies. That changes their lives forever. But when K.C finds out that Ursula has been torturing them, the Coopers have to strike back to get Judy back and to eliminate Ursula.

episodes.name: Do You Want to Know a Secret
episodes.overview: When a college student shows up claiming to be a relative, Kira is forced to tell a family secret she's been holding for years. Meanwhile, Marisa and Ernie give K.C. tips on how to handle her first date with Darrien.

episodes.name: Rebel With a Cuz
episodes.overview: When Kira forbids K.C. from spending time with her newfound cousin Abby, the teenage spy finds a way around her mom's orders.

episodes.name: The Mother of All Missions
episodes.overview: Kira reluctantly agrees to help K.C. reunite Abby with her mother Erica, who has been hiding from The Other Side and The Organization for several years.

episodes.name: Accidents Will Happen
episodes.overview: When Darien is mysteriously injured in an accident, K.C. tries to figure out who is behind it. Meanwhile, Craig becomes head of security for a vice-presidential candidate.

episodes.name: Brainwashed
episodes.overview: When K.C. learns Erica and Abby are working with the head of The Other Side to carry out an evil mission at the Presidential election party, the Coopers must act fast to stop the enemy agents.

episodes.name: The Truth Hurts
episodes.overview: Ernie tries to impress The Organization with his science skills and develops a truth serum. Things get out of hand when K.C. accidentally drinks it and has to complete an interview to help Marisa get a job.

episodes.name: Down in the Dumps
episodes.overview: To boost Ernie's self-confidence, K.C. and Craig tell him that he's in charge of their next mission, but secretly K.C. is really running point.

episodes.name: Dance Like No One's Watching
episodes.overview: When K.C. goes undercover in a retirement home as wise-cracking senior citizen Bernie, her disguise unexpectedly wins the affection of feisty senior, Irma.

episodes.name: The Love Jinx
episodes.overview: When Craig and Kira discover they were never legally wed, K.C. decides to throw them a do-over wedding.

episodes.name: K.C. Levels Up
episodes.overview: When K.C. has to find an undercover spy to pass a test for a promotion at The Organization, everyone at the Cooper's neighborhood potluck becomes a suspect. Meanwhile, Petey is on his own mission to try and scare Judy.

episodes.name: Catch Him If You Can
episodes.overview: When K.C. has to capture wanted computer hacker Noah Stone, she finds herself in competition with teen bounty hunter Pinky Carter, who is also determined to take the hacker into custody.

episodes.name: Sup, Dawg?
episodes.overview: When K.C. has to catch a ring of criminals smuggling fireworks, she reluctantly has to take on a new partner, canine spy Dexter.

episodes.name: Tightrope of Doom
episodes.overview: K.C. and her family of spies assume a myriad of disguises to catch an art thief, including going undercover as performers in a traveling circus.

episodes.name: The Legend of Bad, Bad Cleo Brown
episodes.overview: Grandma Gayle takes K.C. and Ernie back to the 70s to relive how Cleo Brown became the first Black female spy for The Organization.

episodes.name: Spy of the Year Awards
episodes.overview: Kira's big moment at the Spy of the Year Awards is interrupted when the son of Tony "The Big Toe" Tolentino crashes the secret ceremony to avenge his father.

episodes.name: In Too Deep (1)
episodes.overview: K.C. and Ernie go undercover with a planet-loving group called the Volunteens, while Craig is getting in shape for his new assignment to protect an ambassador.

episodes.name: In Too Deep (2)
episodes.overview: K.C. is given a mission by the Volunteens organization that pits her against Craig and his assignment to protect the ambassador.

episodes.name: Virtual Insanity
episodes.overview: When K.C. goes into a virtual reality game to rescue Ernie, it becomes the craziest Halloween ever for the teen spies as they try to tackle the alternate universe and enemy agents Darci and Damon, the masterminds behind the evil game.

episodes.name: Undercover Mother
episodes.overview: When Scholastic Achievement Quarterly tries to interview K.C. for being the smartest student in her school, she disguises herself as her mom so she can be featured and hide her identity as a spy.

episodes.name: Trust No One
episodes.overview: When K.C.'s latest mission is compromised, she is tasked to find the mole in The Organization.

episodes.name: Holly Holly Not So Jolly
episodes.overview: It's Christmas time and K.C. tells everyone she has to go pick up a last minute gift, but instead goes to The Organization's therapist, Dr. Levinstein.

episodes.name: Collision Course
episodes.overview: The Coopers go undercover in a biker club to find Richard, the head of The Other Side. Meanwhile, everyone thinks K.C. is losing it when she claims she saw her evil cousin Abby, the enemy agent she eliminated.

episodes.name: Family Feud
episodes.overview: K.C. and her family find themselves in an epic spy showdown vs. The Other Side when her evil aunt Erica and her family return.

episodes.name: Coopers on the Run
episodes.overview: K.C. and her family of spies, along with her BFF Marisa, are on the run from archenemy Zane in Rio de Janeiro when they must take on another spy like non before – the fierce and slightly bizarre enemy agent Sheena.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Jungle
episodes.overview: K.C., Ernie and Marisa are on the run from Zane and eccentric enemy agent Sheena in the heart of the Brazilian jungle.

episodes.name: Out of the Water and Into the Fire
episodes.overview: When Zane sabotages the Coopers' plane ride, it is up to K.C. to save herself and her family.

episodes.name: Web of Lies
episodes.overview: K.C. is surprised by the results of her SAT score and believes someone tampered with her test. Meanwhile, Marisa expresses interest in becoming a spy.

episodes.name: Teen Drama
episodes.overview: K.C. struggles to make amends with Marisa after their fight, while Marisa wants a recommendation for The Organization from K.C.

episodes.name: K.C. Under Construction
episodes.overview: Unbeknownst to K.C., Marisa is leaking classified information including her latest undercover assignment as a construction worker. Meanwhile, Judy’s disagreement with Diane over the tooth fairy jeopardizes the sophisticated robot’s disguise as an everyday 10-year-old.

episodes.name: The Storm Maker
episodes.overview: K.C. is tasked with tracking down a dangerous weather-controlling device on the same night as her homecoming dance.

episodes.name: Keep On Truckin'
episodes.overview: K.C. lies about losing the weather machine, and sets up her own mission to get it back.

episodes.name: Unmasking the Enemy
episodes.overview: K.C. sets a trap to reveal Brady's secret identity.

episodes.name: The Truth Will Set You Free
episodes.overview: When K.C. tells her family and The Organization that Brady is an enemy spy with The Alternate, the Coopers secretly work with Marisa to set a new plan in motion to catch him.

episodes.name: Stormy Weather
episodes.overview: Ernie and Marisa team up to help K.C. stop Brady and The Alternate from launching The Storm Maker.

episodes.name: Deleted!
episodes.overview: When Judy is due for an upgrade, the Coopers reminisce about their great times before they have to delete her memories and return her to the Organization.

episodes.name: Second Chances
episodes.overview: K.C. realizes she misses Darien and goes to tell him, but he reveals he has a new girlfriend. K.C. lies and says she has a boyfriend and the two agree to go on a double date.

episodes.name: Revenge of the Van People
episodes.overview: Ernie hosts a group of young international agents while KC is away on a mission.

episodes.name: The Gammy Files
episodes.overview: The Coopers prepare for Poppa Earl to visit with his new fiancé, Betty. He surprises everyone with how happy he is, but K.C. recognizes Betty from an unsolved case from 1977.

episodes.name: Take Me Out
episodes.overview: K.C. is tired of being just friends with Darien.

episodes.name: Twin It to Win It
episodes.overview: K.C. is assigned to protect a foreign diplomat at a university ceremony and must go undercover by joining the school's drumline to secure a key position next to the diplomat.

episodes.name: Cassandra Undercover
episodes.overview: Byron waits for K.C. to respond and she says she's not K.C.. but her cousin, Cassandra. Byron suggests they all go to dinner, so K.C. breaks Bernice out of jail to play her cousin.

episodes.name: K.C. Times Three
episodes.overview: The team strategizes on ways to find Bernice.

episodes.name: The Domino Effect
episodes.overview: The Coopers track down agents who are distributing weapons to enemy agencies, only to discover they are parents of K.C.'s classmate Amy.

episodes.name: Domino 2: Barbecued
episodes.overview: As K.C. continues to get closer with Amy, she plants bugs in the Bishops' house to get information on the weapon-distribution list.

episodes.name: Domino 3: Buggin' Out
episodes.overview: K.C. decides to save Ernie since it was her fault the barbecue failed. They learn the Bishops have planted listening devices and someone called the "The Mask" wants the weapons sold.

episodes.name: Domino 4: The Mask
episodes.overview: K.C. and Marisa take Amy on a trip to New York so she won't be at home to witness her "parents" being arrested by the Organization.

episodes.name: K.C. Undercover: The Final Chapter
episodes.overview: K.C. struggles to decide if she should continue as a full time spy or live a normal life at college.

episodes.name: K.C. Undercover: The Final Chapter
episodes.overview: K.C. struggles to decide if she should continue as a full time spy or live a normal life at college.
